search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for PostHog (posthog.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for PostHog can be found at: https://posthog.com/pricing

extracted_content.content:
PostHog is designed to grow with you. Our **10\+ products** (and counting) will take you from idea to product-market fit to IPO and beyond. 🚀

Our generous free tier means **_more than 90% of companies use PostHog for free._** Only add a card if you need more than the free tier limits, advanced features, or want more projects. You still keep the same monthly free volume, even after upgrading.

### Free

No credit card required

#### Free tier on all plans

(resets monthly)

+

**Analytics**

1M events

**Session replay**

5K recordings

**Feature flags**

1M requests

**Experiments**

Billed with feature flags

**Error tracking**

100K exceptions

**Surveys**

250 responses

**Data warehouse**

1M rows

#### Usage-based pricing

If your usage goes beyond the free tier limits, we offer **usage-based pricing.** You can set a billing limit for each product so you never get an unexpected bill.

**Add a credit card and also get:**

*   ~1 project~ 6 projects
*   ~1-year data retention~ 7-year data retention
*   ~Community support~ Email support

#### Rates (after the monthly free tier)

Prices reduce with scale

### Compare plans

**Just pick this one!**

You can upgrade later.

#### _Totally free_

No credit card required

*   **Generous free monthly tier**Usage capped at free tier limits
    
*   **Like, totally free**Almost all product features, no credit card required
    
*   **Community support**Support via community forum
    

#### _Ridiculously cheap_

Usage-based pricing after free tier

#### Starts at $0/mo

 

*   **Generous free monthly tier**Pay nothing if below free tier limits
    
*   **Usage-based pricing**Set billing limits per product so you never pay more than expected.
    
*   **Standard support**Support via email, Slack-based over $2k/mo
    

#### _Starship enterprise_

Usage-based pricing after free tier

#### From $2,000/mo

 

*   **SAML SSO**
*   **Custom MSA**
*   **Dedicated support**
*   **Training & onboarding**
*   **Advanced permissions**
*   **Audit logs**

Show full plan comparison

### Add-ons

We've moved specialized functionality into add-ons so you never pay for things you don't need.

[Explore add-ons](https://posthog.com/addons)

### Compare to similar products

**Amplitude**

**Mixpanel**

**Heap**

![Image 4: Pendo](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/c_scale,w_32/icon_pnd0_dc3ea0f56f)

**Pendo**

![Image 5: FullStory](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/c_scale,w_32/icon_fs_542ca7eb05)

**FullStory**

**PostHog**

**Product analytics**

**Web analytics**

**LLM observability**

**Session replay**

**Feature flags**

**Experiments**

**Surveys**

**Data warehouse**

### Frequently purchased with...

These are some products that pair well with PostHog to help you find product-market fit and maybe even get to an IPO. (In fact, we use them ourselves!)

*   ![Image 6](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/DO_Logo_icon_blue_0ade9109b2.svg)
    
    ##### Digital Ocean
    
    Cloud infrastructure for developers
    
*   ![Image 7](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/vercel_icon_dark_1023f19025.svg)
    
    ##### Vercel
    
    Build and deploy web experiences
    
*   ![Image 8](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/ashby_e4a768e087.svg)
    
    ##### Ashby
    
    All-in-one recruiting software for ambitious teams.
    
*   ![Image 9](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/Algolia_mark_blue_f25812a7a2.svg)
    
    ##### Algolia
    
    AI-powered search and discovery
    

### Latest reviews

Overall rating

### 4.4

738 reviews

Reviews collected by [G2](https://www.g2.com/products/posthog/reviews)

**Easy Analytics for Early Startups**

**What do you like best about PostHog?**

How easy they make it to integrate with your code base.

**What do you dislike about PostHog?**

Learning how to use the analytics dashboard is confusing, but powerful.

**What problems is PostHog solving and how is that benefiting you?**

When I deploy my project I need to know where users encounter the most friction. PostHog will let me diagnose what problems users are having, which is invaluable when traffic is limited

**Genuienly the single best analytics solution i have used.**

**What do you like best about PostHog?**

Posthog is incredibly simple to set up, and the separate features that it has all integrate with both each other and my codebase perfectly, with little-to-no effort.

**What do you dislike about PostHog?**

Delay. My only genuine problem with posthog is that events often take a while to reach the server after they are sent from the client.

**What problems is PostHog solving and how is that benefiting you?**

Posthog is helping us catch errors in our application, and see why/where users are having issues.

**Accessible enterprise grade analytics**

**What do you like best about PostHog?**

PostHog has been a fantastic surprise. I initially expected it to be a heavy and complex analytics tool, but it turned out to be incredibly accessible—especially for early-stage projects. The setup was straightforward and fast, and it integrated seamlessly with my Next.js app, performing far better than expected. What really stands out is how complete the platform is. It has every feature I could need—from product analytics to session replays, feature flags, A/B testing, and more—all in one place. Usually, you need to string together multiple tools to get this level of insight, but PostHog just delivers everything out of the box without feeling bloated. It’s rare to find a tool this powerful that still feels lightweight and developer-friendly. Highly recommended for startups and scale-ups alike.

**What do you dislike about PostHog?**

If I had to pick something, it would be the documentation. It’s not bad by any means, but I think it could be a bit better organized and more detailed in some areas—especially for edge cases or advanced use. That said, this is really just nitpicking.

**What problems is PostHog solving and how is that benefiting you?**

PostHog helps us cover multiple crucial areas in one place—product analytics, web analytics, and session replays. Instead of juggling separate tools, we get a unified view of how users interact with our app. The ability to replay sessions has been especially valuable for understanding UX issues and refining the user journey. Overall, it’s helped us make more informed product decisions and build a better experience based on real user behavior.

### Pricing calculator

### Estimate your price

Event types, explained

Events are billed at different rates based on volume and if you choose to send custom user properties with the event.

### Anonymous events

![Image 10: Anonymous event example](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/v1/posthog.com/src/components/Pricing/PricingCalculator/Tabs/event-anonymous)

### Anonymous events

No individually-identifiable info, analyzed in aggregate, don't use person profiles

By default, events are anonymous, meaning they don't have any personally-identifiable information attached to them.

They come with info about the browser and device, visitor's location, and any UTM parameters.

#### With anonymous events, you can:

*   See a Google Analytics-style dashboard
*   Access properties like UTMs, location, referrer, page views
*   Create **_aggregate_** insights in **Product analytics**
    
    *   How many times users click an element on a page
    *   Group visitors by device type or location
    *   Filter to interactions on a specific page
    *   Track anonymous users across sessions

Pricing starts at

**$0.00005**/event

First 1 million events/mo free

### Identified events

![Image 11: Identified event example](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/v1/posthog.com/src/components/Pricing/PricingCalculator/Tabs/event-identified)

### Identified events

Track usage of specific, logged in users by using [person profiles](https://posthog.com/docs/data/persons).

Identify users by their email address or other unique identifier, and attach custom properties to their person profiles.

#### In addition to anonymous event capabilities, you can:

*   Merge anonymous users with their eventual identified user
    
    *   Like when they sign up for your product or use different devices - enables analyzing the user's path
*   Store custom properties on users
    
    *   Use these properties in cohorts, session replay, experiments, and feature flags
*   Create **_user-specific_** insights in **Product analytics**
    
    *   How many times _specific users_ click an element on a page
    *   Group _cohorts of users_ by device type, location, or property
    *   Filter to interactions on a specific page _by specific users_

Pricing starts at

**$0.000248**/event

First 1 million events/mo free

First 1,000,000 events free – every month!

### Event usage

    $0
    

**$0**

#### Platform add-ons

Teams

**$450**/mo

$0

### Estimated total

for all products & add-ons

$0

#### How our pricing works

*   Only pay for products you use
*   **Generous free tier for each product (resets monthly)**
*   You can set billing limits per product so you never get a surprise bill
*   We also offer **discounts** for startups and non-profits

#### Estimating usage

*   Not sure what your volume looks like? Add the tracking code to your site and check back in a few days – no credit card required.
*   If something stupid happens and you get an unexpected bill (like if [your side project unexpectedly goes viral](https://posthog.com/side-project-insurance) or you’re unhappy), we’ll pretty much always refund it!
*   We've also written [this handy guide](https://posthog.com/docs/billing/estimating-usage-costs) to help!

### Give PostHog a try

No need to pick a plan - try our free version and decide if you want advanced features later!

### More pricing reads

If you've made it this far, you might be interested in these other pages about how our pricing works.

*   [#### Pricing philosophy tl;dr: It's designed to make you happy.](https://posthog.com/pricing/philosophy)
*   [#### How we do "sales" We don't sell you. You'll sell yourself.](https://posthog.com/sales)

Pricing FAQ
-----------

*   ![Image 12](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/c_scale,w_40/v1/posthog.com/src/pages-content/images/hog)
    
    How do I know what my volume is?
    
    ![Image 13](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/c_scale,w_25/v1/posthog.com/src/pages-content/images/team)
    
    Tim Glaser
    
    The easiest way is to sign up for the Free plan. You'll get an accurate volume projection after just a few days.
    
*   ![Image 14](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/c_scale,w_40/v1/posthog.com/src/pages-content/images/hog-3)
    
    Do I pay anything for stored events?
    
    ![Image 15](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/c_scale,w_25/v1/posthog.com/src/pages-content/images/team-3)
    
    Simon Fisher
    
    No, you only pay the fee per captured event in a given month (i.e. you only pay when each event is first received). There are no additional costs or fees.
    
*   ![Image 16](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/c_scale,w_40/v1/posthog.com/src/pages-content/images/hog-5)
    
    How long do you retain data?
    
    ![Image 17](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/c_scale,w_25/v1/posthog.com/src/pages-content/images/team-5)
    
    Tiina Turban
    
    Data (except recordings, see below) is guaranteed to be retained for 7 years on any paid plan and 1 year on a free plan. After 1 year, data may be moved into cold storage so queries may run more slowly.
    
*   ![Image 18](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/c_scale,w_40/v1/posthog.com/src/pages-content/images/hog-6)
    
    How long do you retain recordings?
    
    ![Image 19](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/c_scale,w_25/v1/posthog.com/src/pages-content/images/team-6)
    
    Rick Marron
    
    Recordings are kept on Clickhouse-based installations for 1 month. For paid customers on PostHog cloud, recordings are kept for 3 months.
    
*   ![Image 20](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/c_scale,w_40/v1/posthog.com/src/pages-content/images/hog-7)
    
    What happens after the data retention period elapses?
    
    ![Image 21](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/c_scale,w_25/v1/posthog.com/src/pages-content/images/team-7)
    
    Marius Andra
    
    Any event or user data stored for more than the retention period may be permanently deleted from our systems.
    
*   ![Image 22](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/c_scale,w_40/v1/posthog.com/src/pages-content/images/hog-8)
    
    Is there a free trial on paid plans?
    
    ![Image 23](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/c_scale,w_25/v1/posthog.com/src/pages-content/images/team-8)
    
    Michael Matloka
    
    We have a generous free tier on every paid plan so you can try out the features before paying any money (though you will need to enter your credit card info). If you have additional needs, such as enterprise features, please get in touch.
    
*   ![Image 24](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/c_scale,w_40/v1/posthog.com/src/pages-content/images/hog-9)
    
    What currency are your prices in?
    
    ![Image 25](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/c_scale,w_25/v1/posthog.com/src/pages-content/images/team-9)
    
    James Hawkins
    
    All prices are in US Dollars (USD), excluding taxes.
    
*   ![Image 26](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/c_scale,w_40/v1/posthog.com/src/pages-content/images/hog-10)
    
    Do you offer a discount for non-profits?
    
    ![Image 27](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/c_scale,w_25/v1/posthog.com/src/pages-content/images/team-10)
    
    Eric Duong
    
    Yes in most cases - 25% off any plan. Create your account, then email sales@posthog.com from the same email address with some basic details on your organization. We will then apply a discount.
    
*   ![Image 28](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/c_scale,w_40/v1/posthog.com/src/pages-content/images/hog-11)
    
    Are there any minimums or annual commitments?
    
    ![Image 29](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/c_scale,w_25/v1/posthog.com/src/pages-content/images/team-11)
    
    Cameron DeLeone
    
    Nope. We can, however, offer annual commitments (for example, to maintain pricing) if you need them as part of an enterprise agreement.
    

Have another pricing-related question? [Ask in our community forum](https://posthog.com/questions/topic/pricing)

This is the call to action.
---------------------------

### If nothing else has sold you on PostHog, hopefully these classic marketing tactics will.

![Image 30: PostHog Cloud](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/v1/posthog.com/src/components/Home/images/cloud-cd)

![Image 31: People on G2 think we're great](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/v1/posthog.com/src/components/Home/images/g2-badge)

Notendorsed  
by Kim K

\*PostHog is a web product and cannot be installed by CD.  
We _did_ once send some customers a floppy disk but it was a Rickroll.

*   **Select your cloud**
*   **Starts at:**
    
    ~$0~Free\>1 left at this price!!
    

**Hurry:** Tons of companies signed up .  
Act now and get $0 off your first order.

> You always need to find ways to improve. PostHog is central to how we do that at Y Combinator. It helps us try ideas, measure results, and build better products.

![Image 32: Vacation Hog](https://res.cloudinary.com/dmukukwp6/image/upload/c_scale,w_252/v1/posthog.com/src/components/Pricing/images/vacation-hog)

Looking for the signup button?

(I’ll take you there.)

Find out how much it costs to use PostHog

pricing_data.pricing_notes: PostHog offers a generous free tier with monthly resets and usage-based pricing for exceeding limits. Discounts are available for startups and non-profits.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Generous free tier with monthly resets.

features: Standard support via email, Slack-based over $2k/mo
